Package es.ulpgc.eii.spool.crawler.strategy

package es.ulpgc.eii.spool.crawler.strategy
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    es.ulpgc.eii.spool.crawler
     
  • Class
    Description
    CrawlerStrategy<T extends Event>
    Root abstraction for all event crawling strategies in the spool-crawler framework.
    PullCrawlerStrategy<T extends Event>
    A CrawlerStrategy for on-demand, pull-based event ingestion.
    PullCrawlerStrategy.SourceStep<R>
    Intermediate builder step that holds the configured CrawlerSource and awaits the EventDeserializer to complete the strategy.
    StreamCrawlerStrategy<T extends Event>
    A CrawlerStrategy for continuous, push-based event ingestion from long-lived streaming sources such as Kafka, RabbitMQ, or WebSockets.
    StreamCrawlerStrategy.SourceStep<R>
    Intermediate builder step that holds the configured StreamSource and awaits the EventDeserializer to proceed.
    StreamCrawlerStrategy.StreamBuilder<R,T extends Event>
    Final builder step that assembles the StreamCrawlerStrategy with optional event and error callbacks.
    WebhookCrawlerStrategy<R,T extends Event>
    A CrawlerStrategy specialized for webhook-based ingestion, where external systems push raw payloads to your application.
    WebhookCrawlerStrategy.WebhookBuilder<R,T extends Event>
    Final builder step that assembles the WebhookCrawlerStrategy with an optional onEvent callback.
    WebhookCrawlerStrategy.WebhookSourceStep<R>
    Initial builder step which captures the raw payload type and awaits the EventDeserializer.
